title: Rogozin puts poison-pill conditions on OneWeb Soyuz launch
summary: This week’s Soyuz launch of a set of OneWeb satellites has been thrown into doubt after Russia made new demands on the company.

title: Russia places extraordinary demands on OneWeb prior to satellite launch
summary: Cooperation in space among Russia and the West has been stripped to the bone.

title: Russian sanctions throw South Korean satellite missions into uncertainty
summary: South Korea, at least for now, is pushing forward with its planned launch of two satellites on Russian rockets this year. Still, it doesn’t rule out the possibility that the missions could be delayed due to sanctions imposed on Russia for invading Ukraine.

title: CesiumAstro raises $60 million in Series B funding round
summary: CesiumAstro Inc. raised $60 million in a Series B funding round led by Airbus Ventures and Forever Ventures.

title: Romania signs the Artemis Accords
summary: Romania became the 16th country to sign the NASA-led Artemis Accords for cooperation in space exploration March 1.
